name: MEC Deluxe Pillow
categories: Sleeping bags, sleeping pads, quilts and pillows
description: A touch of luxe for campers and hikers. The Deluxe Pillow compacts nice and small and is light enough to bring on backpacking trips or long-haul travels. Inflate it as much as you want to adjust its firmness and height.Made of polyester knit with a brushed, soft finish.Foam topper is made of open cell foam scraps left over from sleeping pad construction.Internal TPU film and welded baffles keep it airtight and supportive.Inflates with just a few breaths of air.Includes a nylon stuff sack.When fully inflated, Medium is 27.5 x 39 x 12cm, Large is 30 x 49 x 12cm.
